document_data.name: Mutruuch
document_data.History: In 1484 DR, during the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Mutruuch was a member of the [[orc]] army that besieged [[Mithral Hall]]. She and some orc minions accompanied [[Szordrin Xorlarrin]] to secretly infiltrate the Keep. Mutruuch and her minions remained behind to control the entrance to the tunnel. However, they were discovered and defeated by an adventuring party.
